head.title: Direct Partners Buys A New York Agency

hedline.hl1: Direct Partners Buys A New York Agency

abstract.p: Direct Partners is opening office in New York by acquiring and absorbing FSA Communications; financial terms undisclosed; Ed Forti, managing partner at FSA, become managing director of new office (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: Direct Partners in Santa Monica, Calif., part of the Omnicom Group, is opening an office in New York by acquiring and absorbing FSA Communications. Terms were not disclosed. Ed Forti, 53, managing partner at FSA, becomes managing director of the new office, which opens with 60 employees and billings estimated at $150 million from clients like the Citibank unit of Citigroup, the OnStar unit of General Motors and Unilever.
